mapper.select: SELECT s.managecode, s.type, s.typedetail, s.name, s.address, s.x, s.y, s.sort, s.hoshi, s.materials, di.latest_ins_date FROM structure s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT managecode, MAX(ins_date) AS latest_ins_date FROM damage_inspect GROUP BY managecode ) di ON s.managecode = di.managecode ORDER BY s.managecode

SELECT s.managecode, s.type, s.name, s.address, s.x, s.y, s.sort, s.hoshi, s.materials, s.typedetail, c.crack, c.elecleak, c.leak, c.variation, c.abnormality FROM structure s LEFT JOIN constimp c ON s.managecode = c.managecode WHERE s.managecode = #{managecode}
SELECT managecode, type, name, address, x, y, sort, hoshi, materials FROM structure where hoshi = 1 ORDER BY managecode

SELECT i.inscode, i.managecode, i.crackcnt, i.elecleakcnt, i.leakcnt, i.variationcnt, i.abnomalitycnt, i.ins_date, i.inspactor, c.crack, c.elecleak, c.leak, c.variation, c.abnormality FROM damage_inspect i LEFT JOIN constimp c ON i.managecode = c.managecode WHERE i.managecode = #{managecode} ORDER BY i.ins_date DESC
mapper.insert: Insert structure Set name = #{name}, type = #{type}, typedetail = #{typedetail}, address = #{address}, sort = #{sort}, x = #{x}, y = #{y}, materials = #{materials} WHERE managecode = #{managecode}
mapper.update: UPDATE structure SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, typedetail = #{typedetail}, address = #{address}, sort = #{sort}, x = #{x}, y = #{y}, materials = #{materials} WHERE managecode = #{managecode}
UPDATE constimp SET crack = #{crack}, elecleak = #{elecleak}, leak = #{leak}, variation = #{variation}, abnormality = #{abnormality} WHERE managecode = #{managecode}
